name: Microsoft Excel资源管理错误漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise", "Microsoft Microsoft Office LTSC 2021", "Microsoft Microsoft Office 2019", "Microsoft Microsoft Office LTSC 2024", "Microsoft Microsoft Office LTSC for Mac 2021 >=16.0.1\uff0c<16.102.25101223", "Microsoft Microsoft Office LTSC for Mac 2024 >=16.0.0\uff0c<16.102.25101223", "Microsoft Office Online Server >=16.0.0.0\uff0c<16.0.10417.20059", "Microsoft Microsoft Excel 2016 >=16.0.0.0\uff0c<16.0.5522.1000"]
description: Microsoft Excel是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一款Office套件中的电子表格处理软件。Microsoft Excel存在安全漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞可以远程执行代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-59225
patch: Microsoft Excel资源管理错误漏洞的补丁
